alert.note: Alert for Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 1:14PM PDT until April 13 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest or west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 2 PM Wednesday to 5 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways impacted include I-15, US 395 and Highway 58.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
